title: Problematic Weekly Mission
body:
**There is a mission which goes like this:**
_" 0/1 Reach level 6 by the second Shared Draft (Round 11)"_

Why would you want to lessen your chances to win?
This causes you to lower your income by not getting invest money.

If you have had bad RNG with heroes you don't want to invest gold to have another shitty hero on board, because 
you lose your lose streak because of 1 round and most likely lose everything after it because you get less gold for winning.

If you have had good RNG you don't want to waste gold because you want to get fast as possible to 50 gold because it is more important than win streak.

It is like boost of adrenaline which causes you to die.

replies.body: I have one that says "Have 50 Gold in your inventory" or something. So I'm being encouraged to not spend gold on building a team....I kind of get it if it's late in the match to get it but that's really it....

Saving money actually benefits you to earn more. I believe each 10 coins grant you an extra gold up a maximum of 5. So whether if the quest tells you to do it or not, you should be saving if you're winning matches. What's worse is when everyone gets the same quest to collect specific passives. By everyone focusing on the same thing to complete their quest, it actually messes up everyone in the game.

Correct, and missions that require players to chase the same champions globally all around the world is absurdity, and has to be a compromise, to make them missions players can look forward to. Perhaps by having them (not removing them completely)...but make each handful of "the champion specific" mission types, be a different champion requirement every "x" number of players, so thousands of players aren't trying to do the same thing all around the WORLD! It's definitely frustrating when everyone has the same mission, so everyone is constantly taking what everyone needs lol! While League of Legends programming is sloppy and mediocre at times, at least it's still a fun game.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/teamfight-tactics/hQfi7EQT-poll-vote-to-ban-boring-mission-from-tft-reach-lvl-6-before-draft-share-round-11
I mean it's only one game you have to do it for the mission, and I did it first game no problem. It's not like you have to play this way every game.

You don't need any special luck to complete this mission.  Round 11 is actually the THIRD carousel if you count the carousel at the very beginning of the game, and it's very easy to get level 6 by this round.

Please note that missions aren't credited until the game ends, which means even if you lose (or quit) early, it won't giving you credit until everyone is out of the game.
The problem with this mission is not the goal, it's that no matter if you complete that goal, it doesn't actually register that you did, and refuses to give you the reward.

i have yet to complete the reach 6 b4 round 11, literally did it 5 games to force it not once has it finished yet, if it doesnt complete b4 i finish the   0/0 rounds to 20 ill submit a ticket cuz i want my darn rewards
